name: This Way The Briggle Comes!
description:
This Way The Briggle Comes!

Can survive a hostile planet and make your way back home?

Will your mission be a success?

Star-bound and scared, can you survive?

What foul creatures lurk on alien worlds?  

A text-based survival/adventure set on a distant planet. 

With artwork by Lewis Fox 

Made for  Science Fiction Jam

Made in Twine, powered by Harlowe.

a From the Chasm production, 2019.
